img_above_text:
# Pale-Axe Stalwart

The Pale-Axe Stalwart is a Character boss you'll go up against at the start of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. After defeating the imposing Stalwart, you'll be asked to complete a side quest for him.

## How to Find Pale-Axe Stalwart
img_below_text: From the first Keeper's Shrine of the Chapter, go right. On the other side of the underpass, you'll walk straight into another round of fighting. This time, you'll find the Revenants fighting Bull Sergeants.
